item.description:
This is the beginning of the GET HEALTHY part of the group activities..
We are going to continue the copy writed, Wine'os on the Mountain Events and Pot Luck Lunches/Dinners at Geological Eventsand some colder weather river kayak trips, but with the fall season, its going to take more energy and muscle wearing those heavy coats and blankets at the top..etc..
so GET IN SHAPE NOW...

You eat some healty food before or bring some snacks while walking,

This location is a historic part of town and is lit..

Conversations on many different topics are the norm on these walks,
if enough propane is left for the fire pit, it gets lit after the walk to add a calming relaxing environment.

Old Historic Wethersfield has a old style Main Street where Comstock, Ferrie Hart Seed, The Cove House and a bunch of other well known and lesser known Historic houses .

To do a trip down and back and a few other streets is about an hour..more if a few divertion streets are taken...
There is an ICE CREAM SHOP right near by..tastes great.....but..its bad for the gut and butt..

The scare crows are all along main street on both sides.

>>>>Meet at Comstock Ferrie out in the front lot by and in the Gazebo thats out in front.


Getting there:
From I-91 North:
Take exit 26 off I-91 and turn left at end of exit ramp. Turn left again at stop sign. Pass entrance to highway and turn left at the T-intersection onto Marsh Street. Wind around the cemetery on your right and you'll see First Church. Make a right at the stop sign onto Main Street. Parking areas are just past church on the right or left side of the street. Comstock ferrie is the BIG brick building by the ice cream shop.

From I-91 South:
Take exit 26 off I-91 and turn right at end of exit ramp. Make your first left onto Marsh Street. Wind around the cemetery on your right and you'll see First Church. Make a right at the stop sign onto Main Street. Parking areas are just past church on the right or left side of the street. Comstock ferrie is the BIG brick building by the ice cream shop.

From Route 9:
Take Route 9 to CT-175 EAST (Newington). Stay on 175 for 5.87 miles all the way to the church! (Name changes from Cedar Street in Newington to Wells Road and then Main Street in Wethersfield.) When you cross the Silas Deane Highway (Rt. 99), you'll enter Old Wethersfield. First Church is about 3/4 miles down on the right. Parking areas are just past church on the right or left side of the street. Comstock ferrie is the BIG brick building by the ice cream shop.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: ScareCrow Walk Through Historic Wethersfield's Mainstreet
